structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Owner's consent required for certain routes.
law.text: No such route shall pass through the yard or garden, or between the dwelling and spring or other buildings of any owner or occupant of land, without the consent, in writing, of the owner and occupant.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4361.
